Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Prime Location on Daniel Island.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Three building campus with 289,194 SF.  Amazing opportunity to sublease a well-appointed and fully furnished office Campus.  This 3 building campus that totals ~289,194 sf and can be subdivided in a multitude of ways.   "Building One" ~65,000 SF is currently set up as a call center and comes complete with a back-up generator and an extra large parking lot.  "Building Two" ~78,394 SF is currently set up as executive office space with plenty of work and meeting space. "Building Three" ~145,800 SF is currently set up as collaborative office space with plenty of break out and meeting space with large break areas and lounges.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Tech Office Space for Sublease

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Prime Location on Daniel Island.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Amazing opportunity to sublease a well-appointed and fully furnished office building.  This 3-story building is part of a 3 building campus that totals ~289,194 sf and can be subdivided in a multitude of ways.   "Building Two" is currently set up as executive office space with plenty of work and meeting space.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Tech Office Space for Sublease

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: OFFERING TURNKEY DELIVERY WITH FF&E IN PLACE

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Prime Location on Daniel Island.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Amazing opportunity to sublease a well-appointed and fully furnished office building. This 2-story building is part of a 3 building campus that totals ~289,194 sf and can be subdivided in a multitude of ways. "Building One" is currently set up as a call center and comes complete with a back-up generator and an extra large parking lot.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Tech Office Space for Sublease

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Prime Location on Daniel Island.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Amazing opportunity to sublease a well-appointed and fully furnished office building.  This 4-story building is part of a 3 building campus that totals ~289,194 sf and can be subdivided in a multitude of ways.   "Building Three" is currently set up as collaborative office space with plenty of break out and meeting space with large break areas and lounges.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Tech Office Space for Sublease

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Great location on East Bay Street between North Atlantic Wharf and Middle Atlantic Wharf.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Property is zoned limited business which is perfect for retail or office use. The building is attached to the city parking garage. Onsite parking is available for an additional monthly rate. Tenant is responsible for their own utilities, janitorial, and any increases from base year on taxes and insurance.
Suite B is 3,284 SF on the 2nd floor. Parking is available at market rate in the attached city garage.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Great location on East Bay Street between North Atlantic Wharf and Middle Atlantic Wharf.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: A block away from Meeting Street. Between Church Street and Meeting Street.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Fantastic corner building at 49 Broad Street on the corner of Broad Street and Church Street in the heart of the Charleston Historic District is available for lease. The first and second floors may be leased at 4,040 SF or you may lease the whole three story building of 5,205 SF. The rate is $25.00 for the whole building and $28.00 for just the first two floors. Tenant to pay the pro-rata share of taxes and insurance costs and its own utilities and janitorial costs. The building has an elevator and two - double parked sparking spaces behind the building. The building has been renovated and is in great condition.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Fantastic corner building at 49 Broad Street on the corner of Broad Street and Church Street in the heart of the Charleston Historic District

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Downtown near the Historic Market.  Between Cumberland Street and Market Street steps away from East Bay Street.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Great first floor suite in The Franke Building at 171 Church Street. Suite 150 has a reception area, s conference room, a storage room, and three nice offices with windows. We also have parking cards available for the attached garage. The rate of $32.00 / RSF = $4,080 is full service with the landlord paying utilities and janitorial. The tenant will pay increases only over the base year amounts for taxes, insurance and regime fees.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Great first floor suite in The Franke Building at 171 Church Street

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Between Cumberland and Market Street in Historic Downtown Charleston.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The 3rd floor of 174 Meeting Street is truly modern first class office space with lots of windows, natural light and open spaces. You really have to see this space to appreciate its beauty.  

We are offering a full service sublease of this space with the master lease expiring September 30, 2024.  The building owner is agreeable to provide a longer term on negotiated rents.  14,502 RSF and the FF&E may be included, making it truly plug and play. 

Parking is available with 2 spaces under the building at $200 per month per space and 13 spaces in the Cumberland Street garage at $160 per month per space.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Class A Office Space for Sublease

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Ideal location in the heart of the Historic District. On Meeting Street between Pinckney and Haynie Street

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: First Class Full Service office space in 200 Meeting Street - The Bank of America Building. Multiple suites available and spaces can be subdivided.  Excellent location with on site parking in the attached parking garage.  Building features a recently updated gym with men and ladies shower facilities exclusively for the use of tenants.  Close proximity to restaurants, shopping and other businesses.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: First Class Full Service office space

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Corner of Market and Meeting Street

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Class A office building located on the corner of Meeting and Market Streets in the heart of Historic Charleston, SC. The building is the local headquarters of Wells Fargo Bank

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Class A office building

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in the heart of historic Downtown Charleston within walking distance to high end shopping, restaurants and hotels. Less than a block from Broad Street and 4 corners of law.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The building has high ceilings, hardwood floors and a wrap around porch.
The building has 20 on-site parking spaces located behind the building. The parking spaces are $200 per month per space.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Office Space for lease on King Street

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
00 Calhoun Street is a Class A professional multi-tenant office building located in the Historic District of Charleston, between East Bay Street and Meeting Street. Ample  parking is available in the parking garage across the street. 
2,500 - 19,151 RSF is currently available on the 2nd floor and both suites are sub-dividable.  The space is within walking distance to health clubs, grocery stores, dining and shopping.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Class A professional multi-tenant office building located in the Historic District of Charleston, between East Bay Street and Meeting Street

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Between Meeting and King Streets. Excellent downtown
location close to other businesses, shopping and restaurants.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Three story office building at 56 Wentworth Street. Excellent downtown
location close to other businesses, shopping and restaurants.
The first floor is available for lease of 1,300 RSF. The suite provides a receptionist / waiting area, conference
room, kitchen, restroom, copy / work room, two to three private offices and two work stations.
The tenant top pay its own utilities and janitorial and increases only in the real estate taxes and building
insurance over the base year amounts. Great layout and location on the first floor.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Downtown Office with Parking for Lease

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 304 Meeting Street is a three story brick building just South of the intersection of Meeting and Calhoun Street across from the College of Charleston TD Arena.  Suite C is the second floor suite of 598 square feet and provides a small office, a work room, and one large windowed private office.  Tenant may lease up to two on site parking spaces at $200 per month per space.  Tenant to pay its own electric, gas, pro-rata janitorial services at $33.59 per month and its pro-rata water/sewer charges estimated at $14.00 per month.  The rent is $29.10/SF = $1,450 per month and can be available as of August 1, 2021.

Rare opportunity to lease prime retail space on Broad Street. Broad Street is the main corridor that bisects the lower Charleston peninsula and boasts plenty of local and tourist foot traffic. The floor plan features an open layout with a large storefront. Great potential for a beautiful art gallery, boutique shop, or any street retail use.

*Existing tenant to vacate August 1, 2021*

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Retail - Commercial for Lase

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Downtown on King Street. Blocks away from Marion Square

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Beautiful Class A ofice spaces above Williams Sonoma at 359 King Street are on the second and third floors.  The two suites are fully renovated, extremely cool and modern office suites. Heart pine floors, exposed brick walls, and over-sized operable windows that provide tremendous  natural light. 
The building has an entrance on King Street and an entrance in the back off of George Street with elevator access to both floors. We have two suites available consisting of 2,796 RSF and 1,224 RSF. Parking is available for lease in various locations around the building. Great collaborative space for a variety of office users.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Office Space Above Williams Sonoma For Lease

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Corner of Meeting and Mary Street

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 385 Meeting Street is the three story building at the corner of Meeting and Mary Street which is attached to the Visitor Center's parking garage. We have the first floor Suite 101 of 14,958 RSF that we can subdivide available for lease. We also have Suite 103 of 2,523 RSF available for lease. The upper two floors are leased to the Charleston School of Law. We have 150 parking spaces available in the attached garage next door with spaces for lease at $150.00 per month per space. This space has great windows and is cool space. The leases are full service including utilities, janitorial and maintenance. The full service rental rate is $36.00 / RSF

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Downtown Office with Parking for Lease

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Upper King Street in Downtown Charleston. At the corner of King and Radcliffe Streets.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Beautiful Class A office space above O-ku Restaurant on Upper King Street. The building has an elevator in place and provides hardwood floors, exposed brick walls and high ceilings. 

Suite B of 3,522 RSF and Suite C of 3,204 RSF are available and can be combined for 6,726 RSF. The rate is $34 / RSF for the individual suites or $32 / RSF for the suites combined. 

In addition to base rent, tenant is responsible for utilities, janitorial and increases over base year taxes and insurance. We have parking available for these suites.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 2 suites available above O-Ku on Upper King Street

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Construction has begun for a May-June 2021 Delivery.  With excellent visibility and exceptional access to everywhere in Charleston and plenty of walkable amenities, 677 King will be a welcomed addition to the Charleston sky line.  Two ground floor retail spaces and onsite parking will be topped with 3 efficient floors of ~17,000 sf each of Class A office space and then the 5th floor of ~13,000 sf with two outside terraces.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located on Rutledge Avenue a few blocks from Calhoun Street.  Across from Ashley Hall School.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Class A office building downtown located across from Ashley Hall School. Nice reception/waiting area. Flexible open floorplan with a mix of private offices, open space and two private restrooms.  5,801 space can be subdivided to 2,900 SF.
Four reserved on site parking spaces are available for lease at $125 per space per month. Tenant pays own utilities, janitorial and HVAC maintenance. CAM costs for the initial year are included in the base rent.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Beautiful Subdividable Office Space Downtown

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 1 Mile from Clements Ferry Road and I-526

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The Daniel Island Marina Business Park is located less
than 1 mile from the I-526 and Clements Ferry Road
interchange. It features convenience, privacy and is
surrounded by an abundance of natural beauty. The
property has just completed a major renovation and
update. It is in excellent condition with a new and
attractive facade and landscaping.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Daniel Island Marina Business Park

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Off Lockwood Drive near the James Island Connector.  Located in downtown Charleston.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
2nd and 3rd floors of the Rice Mill Building on Charleston Harbor at 17 Lockwood Drive. Parking is available on site. The space can be leased furnished or vacant.

Suite 200: 7,571 RSF
Suite 300: 5,127 RSF

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Beautiful Spaces with Great Views of the Harbor!

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Conveniently located on Rutledge Avenue, between Huger Street and Moultrie Street.  Very Close to Hampton Park.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The space can be leased fully furnished. It contains a reception area, large open training room, conference room, open work space, kitchen and 11 offices. Open ceilings, lots of natural light, modern fixtures, polished concrete floors. FREE ON SITE PARKING!! Tenant pays its own utilities and janitorial costs. The rent increases by 3% per year. The master lease will expire on 9/30/24.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Totally renovated high tech office space

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: NOMO district. Corner of Cunnington Avenue and Meeting Street

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Brand new office building under construction at the corner of Meeting Street
and Cunnington Avenue in the heart of the NOMO district. This brand new,
two story building will be 5,800 RSF with 2,900 RSF per floor. Free on-site
parking is readily available. The entire building of 5,800 RSF can be leased or
it can be lease per floor at 2,900.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Office Building Under Construction

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The area offers a variety of residential development, shopping, dining and recreation spots. The site provides convenient access to West Ashley and Downtown.  Close to the James Island Connector, I-26 is easily accessible.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Located a block away from the busiest traveled road on James Island, 1622 Camp Road is improved for use as a fire station with two office-warehouse buildings totaling 9,513 square feet. There is also a forty-four-foot by twenty-four-foot wood framed covered parking awning. The front building was constructed in 1961 and the back building was constructed in 1989. The two buildings total 5,693 square feet of finished office space and 3,820 square feet of warehouse-garage space. This equates to 60% office space.

3,450 RSF office space in a central West Ashley location. The suite is on the back side of the FedEx Office and Carolina One building. Suite features a large bullpen area with ample natural light, a large break room, two private offices, conference room with table and chairs in place, men's and ladies' restrooms, IT room, and ample storage. In additions to the base rent, tenant will pay its own utilities and janitorial.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 3.450 RSF Available in West Ashley

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located at the intersection of I-526, Highway 17 and Highway 7 in front of the Citadel Mall.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Three building office complex on 10.82 acre site.  Large dedicated parking field.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 2 Class A Office Spaces Available

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Modern Single Story Office Space for lease in West Ashley.  This Class A space was built as a headquarters for a large company with no expenses spared.  With easy access to anywhere in the Low Country and plenty of parking this asset is suitable for any office use.  Building is internally equipped with a white noise system, swipe card entry to building and each suite and designed with dual fiber optics connections for efficient, secure and highly productive working space.  1460 Tobias Gadson also is backed up with an onsite 500 kVa Generator and 250 kVa UPS system.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Class A Office Space

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in West Ashley just off of Paul Cantrell Blvd minutes from I-526

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Modern Single Story Office Space for lease in West Ashley.  This Class A space was built as a headquarters for a large company with no expenses spared.  With easy access to anywhere in the Low Country and plenty of parking this asset is suitable for any office use.  Building is internally equipped with a white noise system, swipe card entry to building and each suite and designed with dual fiber optics connections for efficient, secure and highly productive working space.  1460 Tobias Gadson also is backed up with an onsite 500 kVa Generator and 250 kVa UPS system.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Class A Office Space at 1470 Tobias Gadson Blvd
